made with a 3mm hook the one on the left with a 3 5mm hook in interlocking i prefer a 3mm hook because the stitches are more square and the holes slightly smaller © astrid schandy 2024 aschandy@yahoo no astrid s diagonals sample 7 the information on the technique trellis foundation a trellis is the first series of double_crochet stitches with ch1 space in between and the spaces are called windows which are usually squared the foundation consists of two colours basically the trellis in colour a and the required foundation for colour b the way to approach the colour b foundation is always specified for each work how you work this colour b foundation will result in what kind of pattern you have sometimes you just lay the chain of colour b on top of the colour a trellis and work from the back of from the front other times you have to weave the chain of colour b through the windows of the colour a trellis to have a different effect at the end of this information you have a guide on three of the different ways to start a project the two colours the colour a is the colour of both edges of your work row of colour a always start with a chain 3 and end in a double_crochet the colour b row also start with chain 3 and the row is always one window shorter than the a colour and therefore it is always framed within colour a working the row every row is worked twice first the colour a and then the colour b and then you turn your work therefore the pattern has for example row 5a and 5b please note that all colour a stitches will be made on colour a and the same for colour b never in interlocking crochet do you make one colour stitch on another colour stitch row are worked back and forth so you will have the front side and the back side facing you alternatively at the beginning of each row follow the pattern on where the colour b should hang whether to the front or to the back of your work this is important to make sure your borders look as they should i prefer to end all row with the chain 3 for starting the next row so that it is easier to let it hang to the front or back the stitches interlocking filet uses very simple
